dcterms:creator: H. Yannakoudakis
T. Briscoe
B. Medlock
dcterms:description: The FCE corpus is used for training and evaluating grammatical error correction systems, providing a set of learner English texts with annotated errors.
dcterms:title: FCE (First Certificate in English)

dcterms:creator: T. Mizumoto
M. Komachi
M. Nagata
Y. Matsumoto
dcterms:description: The Lang-8 corpus consists of learner-generated texts with corrections made by native speakers, useful for training models in error correction.
dcterms:title: Lang-8

dcterms:creator: D. Dahlmeier
H. T. Ng
S. M. Wu
dcterms:description: NUCLE is a large annotated corpus of learner English, providing a resource for training and evaluating grammatical error correction systems.
dcterms:title: NUCLE (National University of Singapore Corpus of Learner English)

dcterms:creator: H. Yannakoudakis
Ã˜. E. Andersen
A. Geranpayeh
T. Briscoe
D. Nicholls
dcterms:description: The W&I+LOCNESS corpus is a combination of the Write & Improve and LOCNESS corpora, used for training and evaluating grammatical error correction systems.
dcterms:title: W&I+LOCNESS (Write & Improve + LOCNESS corpus)
